name: .QGZ File Extension
summary: Learn about .QGZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a QGZ file in QGIS (cross-platform). To do so, select Project â†’ Open... from the program's menu bar. Then, navigate to and open your QGZ file.

You can also decompress a QGZ file using any Zip-decompression utility, such as 7-Zip (Windows) or Apple Archive Utility (Mac), if you want to view the QGS and QGD files your QGZ file contains outside QGIS. Before decompressing your QGZ file, you may have to rename it to use the .zip extension.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
